properties.entry: select p_no, p_title, address, p_call, p_status, tem_cate_no, p_score, location_no, p_select_num, rcategory_no from place
select p_no, p_title, address, p_call, p_status, tem_cate_no, p_score, location_no, p_select_num, rcategory_no from place where p_select_num = 100
select p_no, p_title, address, p_call, p_status, tem_cate_no, p_score, location_no, p_select_num, rcategory_no from place where p_select_num = 200
